paper_abstract: We solve the problem of the classification of q-ary perfect quantum codes. We prove that the only nontrivial q-ary perfect quantum codes are those with the parameters (((q(21)-1)/(q(2)-1), q(n-21),3))(q). There exist no other nontrivial q-ary perfect quantum codes.
paper_title: Classification of q-Ary Perfect Quantum Codes
